sentences.en: A movie star? What a poser!
sentences.cn: 电影明星? 真是耍大牌!

sentences.en: Du Mu is a famous poet and poser in the late Tang Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 杜牧是晚唐时期著名的诗人与散文家.

sentences.en: Here is a little poser for you.
In developing CAPP system, the automatic generation of operation drawings is a key poser technologically.
sentences.cn: 在开发CAPP系统时, 工序图的自动生成是一项关键性技术难题.

sentences.en: The dilemma presented quite a poser.
Who does she think she is A movie star? What a poser!
sentences.cn: 她以为她是谁呀?电影明星? 真是耍大牌!

sentences.en: You meet a lot of posers in this job.
sentences.cn: 做这份工作你会遇到很多装腔作势的人。

words.tran_cn: 装模作样的人；装腔作势的人
位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位；vt. 安置；把……放在适当位置
造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论
难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事

trans.tran_cn: <非正>难题，困难，棘手的事，<贬>装腔作势的人
trans.tran_en: someone who pretends to have a quality or social position they do not really have, usually in order to make people notice or admire them
